---
title: 'Taliwindcss Crash Course'
date: 'March 8, 2021'
excerpt: 'Crash course to learn the tailwindcss. Rapidly build modern websites without ever leaving your HTML'
cover_image: 'data:image/jpeg;base64,'
---

## task one 
install tailwindcss with cli
> npx tailwindcss -o ./build/style.css

this code above will create build folder and inside style.css file will content all css classes

## task tow 
create index.html page and link tailwindcss styles

```html
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8" />
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="./build/style.css" />
    <title>Tailwind JIT</title>
  </head>
  <body>
    <div class="p-8 text-center">
      <h1 class="text-4xl text-blue-600 font-bold">Tailwind JIT Tutorial</h1>
      <h2 class="text-2xl text-gray-500 font-semibold">(Just in Time)</h2>
    </div>

    <div class="">
      <button>Click me</button>
      <button>Click me</button>
    </div>

    <div>
      <h3>Todos:</h3>
      <ul>
        <li>Get out of bed</li>
        <li>Play Mario Kart</li>
        <li>Do some work</li>
      </ul>
    </div>
  </body>
</html>

```
## task three
```html
  
<html lang="en">
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="/build/styles.css">
  <title>Tailwind JIT</title>
</head>
<body>
    <div class="p-8 text-center">
      <h1 class="text-4xl text-blue-600 font-bold">Tailwind JIT Tutorial</h1>
      <h2 class="text-2xl text-gray-500 font-semibold">(Just in Time)</h2>
    </div>

    <div class="p-8 text-center">
      <button class="bg-blue-600 text-white p-2 rounded">Click me</button>
      <button class="bg-green-500 text-white p-2 rounded">Click me</button>
    </div>

    <div>
      <h3>Todos:</h3>
      <ul>
        <li>Get out of bed</li>
        <li>Play Mario Kart</li>
        <li>Do some work</li>
      </ul>
    </div>
</body>
</html>

```

## task four

```html

<html lang="en">
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="/build/styles.css">
  <title>Tailwind JIT</title>
</head>
<body>
    <div class="p-8 text-center">
      <h1 class="text-4xl text-blue-600 font-bold">Tailwind JIT Tutorial</h1>
      <h2 class="text-2xl text-gray-500 font-semibold">(Just in Time)</h2>
    </div>

    <div class="p-8 text-center">
      <button class="bg-blue-600 text-white p-2 rounded">Click me</button>
      <button class="bg-green-500 text-white p-2 rounded">Click me</button>
    </div>

    <div class="p-8">
      <h3 class="first-letter:font-bold first-letter:text-green-500">Todos:</h3>
      <ul class="my-4 marker:text-blue-600 list-disc">
        <li class="marker:text-green-500">Get out of bed</li>
        <li class="selection:bg-pink-500 selection:text-white">Play Mario Kart</li>
        <li class="selection:bg-purple-500 selection:text-white">Do some work</li>
      </ul>
      <p class="first-line:font-semibold">Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Cupiditate, incidunt natus voluptate facere soluta, provident sunt magnam culpa corrupti maxime quibusdam? Sunt maxime eaque numquam est at ipsum, officiis quo.</p>
    </div>
</body>
</html>

```

## task five
```html
<html lang="en">
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="/build/styles.css">
  <title>Tailwind JIT</title>
</head>
<body>
    <div class="p-8 text-center">
      <h1 class="text-4xl text-blue-600 font-bold">Tailwind JIT Tutorial</h1>
      <h2 class="text-2xl text-gray-500 font-semibold">(Just in Time)</h2>
    </div>

    <div class="p-8 text-center">
      <button class="bg-blue-600 text-white p-2 rounded">Click me</button>
      <button class="bg-green-500 text-white p-2 rounded">Click me</button>
    </div>

    <div class="p-8">
      <h3 class="first-letter:font-bold first-letter:text-green-500">Todos:</h3>
      <ul class="my-4 marker:text-blue-600 list-disc">
        <li class="marker:text-green-500">Get out of bed</li>
        <li class="selection:bg-pink-500 selection:text-white">Play Mario Kart</li>
        <li class="selection:bg-purple-500 selection:text-white">Do some work</li>
      </ul>
      <p class="first-line:font-semibold">Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Cupiditate, incidunt natus voluptate facere soluta, provident sunt magnam culpa corrupti maxime quibusdam? Sunt maxime eaque numquam est at ipsum, officiis quo.</p>
    </div>

    <div class="p-8">
      <button class="bg-[#f46225] text-[#fff6ca] p-2 rounded">click me</button>
      <p class="text-[24px] mb-4">Lorem ipsum dolor, sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Cum velit, aliquam, eum dolores esse voluptas maiores nulla illo fugit culpa deleniti autem suscipit animi accusamus nam quos dolor temporibus dolore.</p>
    </div>

    <div class="p-8">
      <button class="bg-[color:var(--primary)] text-white p-2 rounded">click me</button>
      <p class="text-[length:var(--leadFont)]">Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Rem, error. Dolorem eos earum placeat magnam distinctio non odio, aut provident, dolorum culpa tempore, natus aspernatur. Dolor recusandae quidem fugiat id.</p>
    </div>
</body>
</html>

```

## list of learn
### layout
1. container
2. box decoration break
3. box sizing
4. display
5. floats
6. clear
7. isolation
8. object fit
9. object position
10. overflow
11. overflow behavior
12. position
13. top /right /bottom /left
14. visibility
15. z-index

### FLEXBOX AND GRID
- flex direction
- flex wrap
- flex
- flex grow
- flex shrink
- order
- grid template columns
- grid column start/end
- grid template row
- grid row start/end
- gird auto flow
- grid auto rows
- gap
- justify content
- justify items
- justify self
- align content
- align items
- align self
- place content
- place items
- place self

### SPACING
1. padding
2. margin
3. space between

### SIZING
- width
- height
- min-width
- max-width
- min-height
- height
- max-height
- min-height

### TYPOGRAPHY
1. font family
2. font size
3. font smoothing
4. font style
5. font weight
6. font variant numeric
7. letter spacing
8. line height
9. list style type
10. list style type
11. list style position
12. placeholder color
13. placeholder opacity
14. text align
15. text color
16. text opacity
17. text decoration
18. text transform
19. text overflow
20. vertical align
21. whitespace
22. word break

### BACKGROUNDS
- Background Attachment
- Background Clip
- Background Color
- Background Opacity
- Background Origin
- Background Position
- Background Repeat
- Background Size
- Background Image
- Gradient Color Stops


### BORDERS
- Border Radius
- Border Width
- Border Color
- Border Opacity
- Border Style
- Divide Width
- Divide Color
- Divide Opacity
- Divide Style
- Ring Width
- Ring Color
- Ring Opacity
- Ring Offset Width
- Ring Offset Color

### EFFECTS
- Box Shadow
- Opacity
- Mix Blend Mode
- Background Blend Mode


### FILTERS
- Filter
- Blur
- Brightness
- Contrast
- Drop Shadow
- Grayscale
- Hue Rotate
- Invert
- Saturate
- Sepia
- Backdrop Filter
- Backdrop Blur
- Backdrop Brightness
- Backdrop Contrast
- Backdrop Grayscale
- Backdrop Hue Rotate
- Backdrop Invert
- Backdrop Opacity
- Backdrop Saturate
- Backdrop Sepia

### TABLES
- Border Collapse
- Table Layout

### TRANSITIONS AND ANIMATION
- Transition Property
- Transition Duration
- Transition Timing Function
- Transition Delay
- Animation
### TRANSFORMS
- Transform
- Transform Origin
- Scale
- Rotate
- Translate
- Skew


### INTERACTIVITY
- Appearance
- Cursor
- Outline
- Pointer Events
- Resize
- User Select

### SVG
- fill
- Stroke
- Stroke Width
